creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
Apparently, the new stylesheets while they look really really cool, they
severely break netscape 4.7x.  I'm putting ken on this as he's the most
qualified person to fix it quickly (and he broke it :-)

creator: nicolaken@apache.org
text:
Fixed style to make the site readable by Netscape 4 browser, by simply changing the
tag that separated sections on the left links to
. Tested and works in Netscape Navigator 4.79 .
